name: Nash Moving Ltd - Packers and Movers Companies Vancouver

owner.name: Nash Moving Ltd - Packers and Movers Companies Vancouver (Owner)

featured_reviews.review_id: Was recommended Nash Moving and they did not disappoint. This was my first time using movers, and it was worth the money. They were very efficient, knowledgeable, professional, and friendly. I didn't find any damage in my units, all my items arrived safe and sound

featured_reviews.review_id: I had a great experience moving my apartment. Nate and his team were very personable and professional, and most importantly, nothing got broken.
featured_reviews.review_text: I had a great experience moving my apartment. Nate and his team were very personable and professional, and most importantly, nothing got broken.

featured_reviews.review_id: Second time my family used Nash Moving Ltd. and again it was 5/5 service. Super friendly, reliable, and generously accommodated my change in plans. Highly recommend.
featured_reviews.review_text: Second time my family used Nash Moving Ltd. and again it was 5/5 service. Super friendly, reliable, and generously accommodated my change in plans. Highly recommend.

featured_reviews.review_id: I can't express how impressed and pleased and happy we were having these guys helping us with our move. Being a realtor I got Nash Moving recommended to me by another realtor. Then I tried them on my clients first and my clients were extremely happy with their service. Then we hired guys for our own move. The guys are working  so hard and so fast and we didn't have a  scratch neither on our furniture nor on any walls. They gave us over 40 large packing bins for packing (returnable), so we didn't need to get any boxes.They wrapped everything and they were working like machines. Yet, their prices are more than reasonable based on quality of their job and the timing. I always recommend Nash Moving to my clients for moving and to my friends and other realtors as well. Next time we move, Nash Moving is our to go company. Way to go guys! You definitely changed the way this industry works! Have you heard of people tipping movers before? Neither did I :)) And we sure did! These guys do amazing job and fully deserve to be tipped. That's how great they are! We recommend Nash Moving for your next move!

featured_reviews.review_id: I used Nash Moving and Storage for a rather complex move, involving the sale of 2 homes with different closing dates, all items from one home being placed in storage for 3 months, and then moving out of the second home and moving all items into the new home over a 2 day period.  Nash Moving handled it all with ease, even making a last minute schedule change with no complaint!  The took great care of our belongings, securely packed, wrapped, padded and protected everything, and put it all back together in our new home.  They came ahead of time and quoted me on the move, were very competitive with their pricing, and they charged EXACTLY what they quoted.  I wouldn't hesitate to use Nash Moving & Storage for future moves, and gladly recommend them to anyone that asks.

featured_reviews.review_id: We have used Nash Moving Ltd. twice now for 2 major moves!  Both times we have been extremely impressed with their level of service & professionalism!  All their employees are super friendly and hard working!  Would definitely use them again in the future as well as recommend them to anybody I now looking for movers!  Thanks again!
featured_reviews.review_text: We have used Nash Moving Ltd. twice now for 2 major moves!  Both times we have been extremely impressed with their level of service & professionalism!  All their employees are super friendly and hard working!  Would definitely use them again in the future as well as recommend them to anybody I now looking for movers!  Thanks again!

featured_reviews.review_id: We hired Nash Moving for our recent move from Vancouver to Nanaimo. Hands down, this was the best team of movers we have ever worked with (and we've moved quite a few times over the years!). Pricing was reasonable and transparent, communication was easy and clear, and the move itself was smooth and stress-free. Everything was loaded up efficiently and safely, and then delivered quickly and without a scratch. And the moving team was totally fun to just hang out with! I can't recommend them enough.
featured_reviews.review_text: We hired Nash Moving for our recent move from Vancouver to Nanaimo. Hands down, this was the best team of movers we have ever worked with (and we've moved quite a few times over the years!). Pricing was reasonable and transparent, communication was easy and clear, and the move itself was smooth and stress-free. Everything was loaded up efficiently and safely, and then delivered quickly and without a scratch. And the moving team was totally fun to just hang out with! I can't recommend them enough.

featured_reviews.review_id: I'm really grateful for Nash Moving Ltd's services. They offered me a really good deal for the amount of work done. Nothing was broken during the move, which is a miracle, in my opinion. They are professional and they got it completed in a timely manner (other moving companies, in my experience, waste time sitting around trying to get even more money). This company is a company of integrity, one that can be trusted, and one I'd definitely use again in the future.
